name: Spheriums
description:
From a startup indie studio comes Spheriums, a 1st-person adventure game about an energy-based lifeform called Spheriums. As Spheria, you will uncover the elders' old secrets, overtake the many dangerous habitats, repel the Drainers' your greatest enemies and their minions!

Key Features

  • A fantastic adventure in multiple worlds.
  • A great variety of challenging enemies and native species.
  • Different levels of mysteries to solve and new opportunities to unlock.
  • Side quests to get new powers and to learn more about the story.
  • Many achievements.
